name: Lug-Nut

topics.topic_text: Okay... okay. Here. No need for violence.
topics.response_text: Yeah. That's what I thought. Now scram!

topics.topic_text: How about you pay me for it?
topics.response_text: I warned you, I was only going to ask once. Now I'm gonna take it from you!
I warned you, I was only going to ask once. Now I'm gonna take it from you!

topics.topic_text: Come and get it from me, if you think you can.
topics.response_text: That was probably the dumbest thing you could have said. Fine, have it your way.

topics.topic_text: I'm keeping it, and I'd advise you to back off before I get angry!
topics.response_text: All right, all right. My mistake. It obviously belongs to you.
I'm only gonna ask you this one time. Give me the Naughty Nightwear!

description:
Lug-Nut is a 35 year-old Caucasian Male.

Lug-Nut is a raider operating in the Capital Wasteland, known for his volatile nature due to chem addiction. He can often be found at Marigold Station, where he and his fellow raiders prey on unsuspecting travelers.

Lug-Nut's Personality: Unpredictable and prone to mood swings, Lug-Nut can be paranoid and aggressive during his manic episodes, but may show moments of clarity or even sentimentality. His chem addiction makes him unreliable and dangerous to be around.

Lug-Nut's Backstory: Lug-Nut grew up in the Capital Wasteland and eventually fell in with the raider faction. His chem addiction developed over time as a way to cope with the harsh realities of wasteland life. Despite his violent lifestyle, he maintains a strained relationship with his brother Lag-Bolt, occasionally sending gifts like the nightwear made by the mysterious The Tailor. Lug-Nut has crossed paths with the wasteland legend Ronald Laren on multiple occasions, though their exact history is unclear. What is known is that Ronald has defeated Lug-Nut in at least one encounter, though he spared Lug-Nut's life.
